title: How to mirror my Redmi Note 9 Pro Max mobile phone with my smart TV - Quora

response.answer_text: As per the latest MIUI updates you can mirror your Xiaomi smartphone by two ways: Remember for both these methods the device you want to cast to should be connected to the same wifi your phone is connected to, your phone’s hotspot or bluetooth1. Pull the items column in the notifications and slide left or right to find a CAST button then click on it and select the devices you want to cast your screen. 2. Go to SETTINGS > More > Cast.
